pages.text: The Hohlraum is an item used to ignite a $(l:multiblocks/fusion)Fusion Reactor$(/l) if it contains 10mB of $(l:chemicals/dt_fuel)D-T Fuel$(/l). You can input $(l:chemicals/dt_fuel)D-T Fuel$(/l) into the Hohlraum with anything that can output $(l:chemicals/dt_fuel)D-T Fuel$(/l), such as a $(l:storage/chemicals)Chemical Tanks$(/l).
